name: SenateLogicV1
description: Senate Logic Code. This contract is used by the Version Control to determine what smart contracts are allowed to use in the ecosystem. It's logic code, cast a proxy with it.

functionDecorators.name: EnactLaw
functionDecorators.description: Enact a law. Will only work if past enaction time and positive votes >= negative votes.

parameterDecorators.name: _lawIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the LawProposition to be enacted.

functionDecorators.name: VoteOnLaw
functionDecorators.description: Vote on a law if you are a legitimate cryptograph owner. For now, only the first # of each edition has voting rights.

parameterDecorators.name: _vote
parameterDecorators.description: True for agreeing with the law, false for refusing it.

parameterDecorators.name: _lawIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The LawProposition index to be voted on.

parameterDecorators.name: _editionSerial
parameterDecorators.description: The edition serial # of the Cryptograph.

parameterDecorators.name: _cryptographIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the cryptograph index that we will use to lookup owners.

functionDecorators.name: isAddressAllowed
functionDecorators.description: The Version Control must ask the senate (using this function) if an address is authorized before setting it in code. New addresses are voted in by cryptographs owners.

parameterDecorators.name: _candidateAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The serial of the Cryptograph you want to peek highest bid on.

returnDecorators.description: If the address can be used in the Version Control.

functionDecorators.name: powerToThePeople
functionDecorators.description: Set the senate to democratic : new laws must be voted upon.

functionDecorators.name: quaranteNeufTrois
functionDecorators.description: Forcefully add or remove an address from the addresses the VC can use. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Article_49_of_the_French_Constitution.

parameterDecorators.name: _candidateAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The serial of the Cryptograph you want to peek highest bid on.

parameterDecorators.name: _allowed
parameterDecorators.description: A bool indicating _candidateAddress use for the Version Control. True if the address is to be allowed, False if disallowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _law
parameterDecorators.description: The proposed logic smart contract address to be added to the VC law pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _duration
parameterDecorators.description: The time (in second) during which this law should be submitted to voting.

parameterDecorators.name: _revokeLaw
parameterDecorators.description: Set to true if the law is to be removed instead of added to the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _stateOfEmergency
parameterDecorators.description: Set to true if democracy is to be revoked in the senate. Override _law and _revokeLaw.

returnDecorators.description: The index of the new law in the law index.
